abstract: Serbian officials say plunge of Pres Tomislav Nikolic's plane was caused by co-pilot, who spilled coffee in cockpit and accidentally activated emergency switch; plane returned safely to Belgrade.
lead_paragraph: In trying to clean up the spill, the co-pilot accidentally activated an instrument that led to a brief engine shutdown, investigators said.

headline.main: Co-Pilot’s Coffee Spill Blamed in Plunge of Serbian President’s Plane
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Serbia: Co-Pilot’s Spilled Coffee Led to Plane’s Plunge, Inquiry Says

snippet: In trying to clean up the spill, the co-pilot accidentally activated an instrument that led to a brief engine shutdown, investigators said.
